job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) in Saint Joseph, MO
pros: Excellent benefits, great teamwork, genuinely feel like management cares about me, coworkers are like family, love Northwest Health Services mission!
Good pay; depending on clinic usually no OT; most providers are good;
cons: Too many controlled medication patients who are addicted and thus difficult to deal with; at clinic in village drive too many chiefs and not enough Indians causing over abundance of micromanagement which changes all the time; LOTS of drama amongst the employees; rules of treatment change with each clinic

job_title: Registered Dietitian in Saint Joseph, MO
pros: This health center is very patient focused and works with the most delicate and vulnerable population. This health center is a huge asset to the community's health.
